description.value: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes a medication from the VTM/VMP/VMPP/AMP/AMPP subsets from the dm+d terminology. Any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS dm+d VTM' subset with subset original id 601000001138; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'National Health Service dictionary of medicines and devices virtual therapeutic moiety simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000581000001102. Or any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS dm+d VMP' subset with subset original id 701000001134; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'National Health Service dictionary of medicines and devices virtual medicinal product simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000561000001109. Or any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS dm+d VMPP' subset with subset original id 901000001131; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'National Health Service dictionary of medicines and devices virtual medicinal product pack simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000571000001104. Or any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS dm+d AMP' subset with subset original id 801000001139; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'National Health Service dictionary of medicines and devices actual medicinal product simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000541000001108. Or any code from the SNOMED CT UK 'NHS dm+d AMPP' subset with subset original id 1001000001133; the corresponding SNOMED CT UK Refset fully specified name is 'National Health Service dictionary of medicines and devices actual medicinal product pack simple reference set (foundation metadata concept)' with Refset Id 999000551000001106.
